data.prayer: Father, help your children in Yamunanagar, Haryana, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yamunanagar, Haryana, India

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Yamunanagar to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Yamunanagar, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Yamunanagar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jat Pawania people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Yamunanagar that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Yamunanagar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Yamunanagar, Haryana, India has a population of 216,700.

We estimate Yamunanagar has 2,384 people who might know Jesus, 2,629 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 211,687 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Yamunanagar, Haryana, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
